description: The project is very new but already has a large amount of features. The UI is simpel and works great. Excited to watch where this project will head to.
The app looks nice, and just works. Perfect for viewing DBs.
has everything that i need for managing my databases
Worked with it on windows 11, happy to see it here also. Its simple and clean. Gets the job done.

I tried some bigger apps & IDEs to simply delete fields from an SQLite db & export as a new trimmed db, they all failed somehow. This did it perfectly & fast. UI/UX is unbelievably solid in it's minimalist yet deep approach. Features are good & hope Fabio builds them up slowly, this is a long term winner, steady wins the race.

I've tried various other similar tools, and all are over-complicated design, are bugged, or have had no updates for ever. Antares ticks the box for all my needs. Simple, Fast, works with SQLite and MySQL/MariaDB, Firebird SQL and Postgresql. Covers all the bases for me.

It can occasionally crash, but with each update it is getting much better.
